title: Recruting bronzeys!
body:
Hi I am Snow and I am making a ranked team for bronze people I do not see a lot of these on the Discussion, so I resided ill make one for people to join freely. I'm hoping this team will go great and be lots of fun for every one!

Spots:
Top: Free
Mid: Free
ADC: Free
Supp: Free

There are spots to fill if you would like to but other wise...
Oce Server only Msg me on Skype, league or else just comment.
Thank you so much and have fun :3

Rules:
1. Be Nice
2. Be positive... only to our team xD
3. NEVER SURRENDER!!!

replies.body:
If you're still looking I'll join you :)! I haven't played in a year but my highest rank was a high Silver. I'm just looking for a good group of people to play with :)
I main ADC and Supp. i can mid and top but not as well as the 2 roles prior. 
IGN: GeminiGearfried

Hi! If i'm not late i'm willing to join. I'm silver last season and haven't play ranked this season.

IGN: Lemon
Role: Main jungle and mid but willing to fill any.
Jungle>Mid>ADC>Top>Support

Hi! If i'm not late i'm willing to join. I'm S4 last season and haven't play ranked this season but i'm about high bronze or low silver.
IGN: Krait KIN
Role : Main Support (Thresh, Braum, Morgana, Lulu) but i am good at playing some champion like Zac, Maokai and Irelia.
Support>Jungle>Top>ADC>Mid

Hey, I have been trying to find a bronze team for quite some time and would love it if I could join (if you have any room left that is >.<). At the moment I am currently B3 and can play any role.
Name: JakeOlantern777
Role: Top (high), Mid (moderate/high), Jungle (moderate), Support (high), Adc (moderate\low)
Main Garen, Naut, Ali, Jax, Heim, Sivir, Viktor

Climbed out of bronze, still willing to join your team.
Mid:  Ahri, Zed, Lux, Talon
Jungle: Nocturne, Nautilus, Shaco, Tryndamere
Adc: Draven, Vayne

Ay I'm B5 but iv been up to B2, looking for a good team for ages, had my own and completed provisionals, but then they wanted to play on there own. Message us in-gam if ya still looking for some bronzie gods haha
if your on the OCE and want to join add me on league or skype and ill get it sorted 4 you {{champion:222}}
LEL, this is a nice change to the forums :D.... im S5,  so im not bronze but have fun finding some bronze gods ;)
yeah thanks and i will not find gods XD
I ve got a few mates that are still keen if you havent already found people to join
